rev.desc.rev.desc: Optimized upgrade log and added phase information during loading transfer.
Added panel :post.delete.dbdict.
Modified panel : start, cleanup, set.full.path.
Add the $G.LogPath global parameter in panel start.
The parameter $G.LogPath will be referred in the RAD apm.upgrade.sqlsys.
delete old upgradestatus table
delete the panel for removing the upgrecoonciliation table
pass $L.path.prompt.msg value to apm.upgrade.get.utility.path
provide prompt message for rad: apm.upgrade.get.utility.path
Removed obsolete check for version of "MVS".
save dbdict status after load transfer.bin unload
delete upgreconciliation before load transfer
Added JS call to exit.normal panel to delete the "inboxes" globallist record.
fix path backslash in unix OS
Q fixed internal log exceed max length
handle path without backsplash at the end
Validate the path first until valid path is provided.
Otherwise, existing data will be broken when invalid path is entered.
remove extaccess associated panels: decide.load.extaccess, load.extaccess.dbdict
QCCR1E61363
Removing the following lines:
$L.help.sql="file.name=\"import\" or (field.name=\"format.control\" and file.name=\"export\" and null(term)) and syslanguage~=\"xxx\""
$L.help.sql="syslanguage~=\"xxx\""
If executed in the background make sure that $G.bg is set to true
Load the extaccess dbdict if the version is SC6.2
Modification made for DEVTX BUG14905 to ensure that the loading of transfer.bin is run with the Client Side Load/Unload disabled.

To do this, at the beginning of the process, the status of client side load/unload is saved in a variable. Then, client side load/unload is unconditionally disabled. At the end of the process, the original status of client side load/unload is restored.
Reversing change 14498, do not delete upgradestatus.
Modified to also delete upgradestatus.
Added call to apm.upgrade.fix.sqlbasename
Change made by Erwin Soriano for SCR26745:
1) Second statement in panel set.full.path changed.
BEFORE change: $L.dbdict.sql="name isin "+str({"upgraderesults", "upgradeobjects", "upgradepseudolog"})
AFTER change: $L.dbdict.sql="name isin "+str({"upgraderesults", "upgradeobjects", "upgradepseudolog", "patches"})
This causes the patches file to be deleted before the upgrade.
2) In conjunction with this change, the patches dbdict was changed. The following key was deleted:
Nulls & Duplicates secondary.dbdict
These changes were necessitated because the sql mapping strategy for arrays of structures has changed in SC5.1
(This entry is a follow-up to pbudic's 12/09/02 11:39:29 modification)
Modification made for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287.
Change made for EFIGS to prevent the message "dbInsert: The record being added contains a duplicate key" (for the help file) from appearing in the sc.log.
See the MSWord document named Tsk22900Rqs24287 for details of what was done.
Fix query for help records to allow for all languages.
